title: Let's Watch TV: The Tinder Swindler
description:
This week, Joe and Fran watch an amazing Netflix documentary called The Tindler Swindler. Joe and Fran are both riveted as they get sucked into this crazy story, and they share a time when they had a run-in with a real life swindler, before debuting a new segment called wild story Wednesday!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
